name: GetGroupList
description:
Retrieve a list of groups from Calendly.

This tool calls the Calendly API to return a list of groups. It should be used when you need information about groups within Calendly.

parameters.name: organization_uri
parameters.description: URI of the organization to get associated groups.

value_schema.description: Return groups that are associated with the organization associated with this URI

parameters.name: pagination_token
parameters.description: Token used for pagination to retrieve the next or previous set of groups.

value_schema.description: The token to pass to get the next or previous portion of the collection

parameters.name: number_of_rows_to_return
parameters.description: Specify the number of group entries to return from Calendly.

value_schema.description: The number of rows to return

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the calendly API.

parameters.name: organization
parameters.description: Return groups that are associated with the organization associated with this URI

value_schema.description: Return groups that are associated with the organization associated with this URI

parameters.name: page_token
parameters.description: The token to pass to get the next or previous portion of the collection

value_schema.description: The token to pass to get the next or previous portion of the collection

parameters.name: count
parameters.description: The number of rows to return

value_schema.description: The number of rows to return

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
